# NSDecimalIsNotANumber(_:)

**Function**

Returns a Boolean that indicates whether a given decimal contains a valid number.

## Declaration

```swift
func NSDecimalIsNotANumber(_ dcm: UnsafePointer<Decimal>) -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the value in `dcm` represents a valid number, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Discussion

For more information, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/NumbersandValues/NumbersandValues.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000038i].
